about.

I see myself as someone who can contribute at the intersect of design and development - a designer who works with developers to implement the latest prototypes, and an engineer who develops wireframes and contributes to design reviews.


interaction designer, user experience engineer, design technologist, full-stack user happiness architect - idk what to call myself, I just like doing stuff with the web.
